title: Identify and Modify Code for Transcript Saving (11)
---
### Identify and modify code to save transcript history by appending to a text file, automatically writing on append calls and reading on startup.

Let's identify the code that does that. And make it save transcript history. It should just append, just dump to the text file, whatever it is appended, as Zoe overcomplicated it. This means we're automatically writing every time append gets called, and automatically reading on startup.
